00030 abstract class CMVersion implements CMClass {
00031  
00037  public static function Version() {
00038   return "1.0";
00039  }
00040  
00046  public static function Since() {
00047   return "1.0";
00048  }
00049  
00070  public static function MakeVersion($versionString) {
00071   $parts = explode('.', $versionString);
00072   return (1000000 * $parts[0]) + (1000 * $parts[1]) + $parts[2];
00073  }
00074  
00085  public static function AtLeast($version1, $version2) {
00086   // translate versions to numeric
00087   if(!is_numeric($version1))
00088    $version1 = CMVersion::MakeVersion($version1);
00089   if(!is_numeric($version2))
00090    $version2 = CMVersion::MakeVersion($version2);
00091    
00092   return $version1 >= $version2;
00093  }
00094  
00105  public static function Over($version1, $version2) {
00106   // translate versions to numeric
00107   if(!is_numeric($version1))
00108    $version1 = CMVersion::MakeVersion($version1);
00109   if(!is_numeric($version2))
00110    $version2 = CMVersion::MakeVersion($version2);
00111    
00112   return $version1 > $version2;
00113  }
00114  
00118  public function __toString() {
00119   return "<" . get_class($this) . ">";
00120  }
00121  
00122 }
